data.route_analysis: Air travel via Guatemala City; bus services to key destinations; rental cars for flexibility.
data.seasonal_patterns: Optimal months: December to April; peak holiday season December; rainy season May to October.
data.climate: Tropical climate; warm, with some rainfall during the wet season; best to visit in the dry season.
data.culture: Rich Mayan heritage; vibrant markets; annual festivals like Semana Santa.
